meanings.definition: Make or become smooth or smoother.
meanings.sent1: I used a cloth to smoothen the surface of the table.
meanings.sent2: She likes to smoothen her hair before going out.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to smoothen its fur by licking it.
meanings.sent4: His apology helped smoothen the tension between them.
meanings.sent5: The lotion will smoothen your skin and make it soft.

meanings.sent1: He used sandpaper to smoothen the rough edges of the wood.
meanings.sent2: The baker added extra butter to smoothen the cake batter.
meanings.sent3: The robot's job was to smoothen the surface of the metal plates.
meanings.sent4: Her kind words helped smoothen the situation at work.
meanings.sent5: A gentle massage can smoothen tense muscles and provide relief.
